name: FaraiMedia
overview:
FaraiMedia is a digital and mobile advertising platform that specializes in delivering targeted campaigns to the online/mobile African consumer.

Africa’s strong economic growth and rising population are leading to an increase in spending power. FaraiMedia targets this burgeoning but underserved market. FaraiMedia works directly with advertising clients and online content publishers (whose content serves to an African interest) to ensure that brands are exposed to the right online customer, every time. This means that with our media placement, we ensure digital ads appear in the places the brand’s target market is likely to visit/frequent, whether that means relevant blogs, industry websites, private web properties, or content networks like Facebook and Google.
